short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Diagnostic CSS stylesheet that helps visually detect any potentially invalid, inaccessible or erroneous HTML markup.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DiagnostiCSS highlights the following problems:

* inline styles and event attributes
* invalid links
* empty or deprecated elements
* elements missing required attributes
